程序包 atu.process

类 Team

java.lang.Object
atu.process.Team
public class Team
extends java.lang.Object
The class that represents the team. It has attributes of 3-4 students, team id, number of the member, Leader's name and their average of K1 and K2 energies.

  • 构造器概要

    构造器
    构造器 说明

    The constructor for Engine class.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Team

      public Team​(int id, int no, Person i, Person j, Person k, Person l, java.lang.String boss)
      The constructor for Engine class. Initializes the attributes like teamid, num, A, B, C, D, and Leader. It also calculates the average of K1_energy and K2_energy of the Person instance A, B, C, and D, and assigns it to the attribute K1_average and K2_average of the Team instance.
      参数:
      id - The id of the Team
      no - The number of members of the Team that ranges from 3 to 4
      i - The Person instance, which is the first student of the Team
      j - The Person instance, which is the second student of the Team
      k - The Person instance, which is the third student of the Team
      l - The Person instance, which is the fourth student of the Team (optional)
      boss - The name of the leader of the Team
